meanings.sent1: The contagiousness of laughter filled the room with joy.
meanings.sent2: The contagiousness of a yawn can make everyone in the room yawn too.
meanings.sent3: The contagiousness of a smile can brighten someone's day.
meanings.sent4: Her contagiousness was like a warm hug spreading through the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The contagiousness of kindness can create a ripple effect of positivity.

meanings.definition: The ability to spread from one person to another.
meanings.sent1: The contagiousness of a cold can cause many people to get sick.
meanings.sent2: The contagiousness of a rumor can quickly spread throughout a school.
meanings.sent3: The contagiousness of a giggle can make others start laughing too.
meanings.sent4: The contagiousness of fear can paralyze a whole community.
meanings.sent5: The contagiousness of a good idea can revolutionize an industry.
